name: d3-dsv
description: A parser and formatter for delimiter-separated values, such as CSV and TSV

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u d3-dsv -n d3_dsv -o build/d3-dsv.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-dsv.js -c -m -o build/d3-dsv.min.js && rm -f build/d3-dsv.zip && zip -j build/d3-dsv.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-dsv.js build/d3-dsv.min.js
